Articles.Content:
LOCATION

HJO

BLOCK-O

STATUS

PREPARED FOR ENEMY ENTRANCE TO JSOI

(To put it in non-millitary units, they are in high Jool orbit, in a blockade orbit. Their status is prepared for enemy entrance to Jool SOI.)

"Enemy spotted, wait what the ****?" Sap said.

"That's going for a ram. Get the RCS going!" Seven said.

"Rodger that, sir." Vad said.

The RCS fires up, but the attacker hits the far left engine. Since there are four engines, they have to shut one off.

"Hit!" Vad said.

"What's gone, Vad?" Seven shouts over the radio.

"Far left engine, sir!"

"At least it didn't take two out. Two central engines on, far right off. Let's get the **** out of here. Notify Laythe Base that enemies are inbound.

"Rodger!" Sap said.

"Engines going retro!" Vad said.

The ship shudders. Signal lost.

"This won't leave Laythe. Scramble fighters." Captain Kater Kerman said.

Chapter 2

"You heard the man get to the fighters!" Kurat shouted to the pilots.

(Numbering fighters because WHO wants to name the guys in it?)

"This is Guardian, requesting de-orbit and attack over." Kold-1 said.

"Negative." Kurat said. "Wait for them to make orbit."

"Radio contact." The Com-manager said.

"Hello. I'll see you in ****." The captain of the enemy fleet said.

"All pilots, weapons free. Engage." Kurat said. "All gunners, to the turrets."

"Radio from Seven, sir!" The Com-manager said.

"Lo" Static. "sh" Static. "need b-" Bang, then static.

"Kold squadron, get to the final transmission of Seven!" The Com-manager shouted.

"Copy, on our way." Kold-2 said.

"Vis contact." Gun-7 said.

"All gunners able to aim north, we've got vis-contact." the Com-manager said.

"That thing's big!" Gun-11 shouted.

"He's locked onto me!" Gun-10 shouted.

"AM, they've got lock-ons!" Com-1 shouted.

"AM's up." AM-C said.

"Incoming!" Gun-10 said.

"Launching." AM-3 said.

"Confirmed hit." VC-1 said.

"Tango down!" Gun-7 said.

"We've got twenty more on RC, so get ready." the Com-manager said.

"Keep firing! I'll get the escape pods ready in case of the worst." Kater shouted.

Edited August 9, 2013 by Sesni
Adding next part.

Hold your horses, I'll do it tomorrow.

Who needs drafts when you can write KSP fan stories on a whim?

(Chapter 2 up.)

Edited August 9, 2013 by Sesni
I guess I won't add a next part...
